title: Ranked lobby reconnect failed?
body: So this happens once in a blue moon where I join a ranked lobby and I disconnect from chat and im unable to champ select, therefore I have to dodge. So my question is.. Why does riot have a reconnect button in the first place? Since I started playing league every chat reconnect has been unsuccessful. It's not on my end either as I can connect to Google. can anyone elaborate  with me? I've put in a image to makes things clearer. Thank you!

replies.body: It could just be that you have a dodgy ISP/DNS. Have you tried using another?
